local_intent: Push the cloth 0.1 m toward 180°, then retreat and pause.
assumptions: End-effector is already aligned and at safe contact with the cloth
Workspace remains clear during the push
coherence_with_global: Keeps perceive→act→retreat for the transfer phase: verifies cloth visibility, performs the directed push (180°, 0.1 m), then retreats and waits, consistent with the global folding-by-push plan.
